tips: "Disabled" entries will still be rendered, but grayed out. Attempts to launch a disabled game will be ignored.
The [Execution] parameter follows the same syntax as a Rainmeter bang. The brackets must be omitted.
If replicating a Rainmeter bang, only one bang is permitted with the start/end brackets omitted. If you need more than 1 Bang for your Path, it is probably unsuited for this environment.
Image assets will treat @Resources\assets\gamebanners as its root directory. Store any image assets you would like to use in that folder.
